Segment.name: MIR
Segment.comment: To determine if mortgage insurance has been approved or declined, and if approved, supply details about the coverage

Field.name: MortgageInsuranceApplicationType
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of Mortgage Insurance application

Field.name: UnderwritingDecisionCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the decision made by the underwriter

Field.name: MortgageInsuranceCertificateTypeCode
Field.comment: Code indicating whether Mortgage Insurance certificate is for primary loan or pool loan or both

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: CompositeUnitOfMeasure
Field.comment: To identify a composite unit of measure (See Figures Appendix for examples of use)

Field.name: MortgageInsuranceRenewalOptionCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of renewal option for Mortgage Insurance

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year
